summary: The lifelong romance between Lolita (Balan) and Shekar (Khan) is upset by the arrival of another man.
cast: Saif Ali Khan|Vidya Balan|Sanjay Dutt|Dia Mirza|Raima Sen|Sabyasachi Chakrabarty|Ninad Kamat|Achyut Potdar|Rekha|Surinder Kaur|Kumkum Bhattacharya|Supriya Shukla|Smita Malhotra|Rajesh Sharma|Howard Rosemeyer|Biplab Chatterjee|Rita Ganguly|Pradeep Chakraborty|Ratan Sarkhel|Meghna Kothari|Gita Dey|Chabbi Talulidar|Mothu Mukherjee|Kharaj Mukherjee|Nimai Lahiri|Tapas Chakraborty|Suman Bannerjee|Zain Khan|Rushita Pandya|Srini|Rohan Tiwari|Tina Dutta|Barkha|Yogendra Singh|Haradhan Bannerjee|George Baker|Amitabh Bachchan|Subarna Ray Chaudhuri|Swini Khara|Rosalind Laugharne|Sonia Mehta|Yogendra Singh Waldia
title: Parineeta
